tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V3.0.0.0 -- build 3 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Dead Snow (2009)
programme.desc: A ski vacation turns horrific for a group of medical students, as they find themselves confronted by an unimaginable menace: Nazi zombies

programme.title: The Forest (2016)
programme.desc: A woman goes into Japan's Suicide Forest to find her twin sister, and confronts supernatural terror

programme.title: It (2017)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town

programme.title: It: Chapter Two (2019)
programme.desc: Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back

programme.title: Sinister (2012)
programme.desc: Washed-up true crime writer Ellison Oswalt finds a box of super 8 home movies in his new home that suggest the murder that he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose work dates back to the 1960s

programme.title: The Witch (2015)
programme.desc: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession

programme.title: Green Room (2015)
programme.desc: A punk rock band is forced to fight for survival after witnessing a murder at a neo-Nazi skinhead bar

programme.title: Insidious (2010)
programme.desc: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2 (2013)
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily

programme.title: Child's Play (1988)
programme.desc: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer

programme.title: Wyrmwood (2014)
programme.desc: A talented mechanic prepares to battle his way through hordes of flesh-eating monsters after his sister is kidnapped on the eve of a zombie apocalypse
